name: Cubi & Spheri
description:
made for the Ludum Dare 46 with the theme "Keep It Alive"

we didn’t manage to get as far with this as we’d hoped, the AI is not good(and i forgotto add nav mesh obstacle to the environement) the level is too clumsy and there is no sound but with the problemes we've got durig the jam i think the result is ok and that there is a bit of fun in there i hope you will like it, we will make a after jam version with all the missing thing. but here’s what we’ve got enjoy!

Control a robot Cubi and protect your friend Spheri from terrible enemies! Watch out for Spheri’s battery and make sure it doesn’t get out of control when reaching electrical terminals!

A game by Hugo Kieffer and Maxence Couteau.

A to punch left stick to move
